Number of bookings for each hotel.sql_query: SELECT h.hotel_name, COUNT(hb.booking_id) as bookings_count FROM hotel_bookings hb JOIN hotel_room_types hrt ON hb.room_type_id = hrt.room_type_id JOIN hotels h ON hrt.hotel_id = h.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_id ORDER BY bookings_count DESC

plot_params.plot_title: Number of bookings for each hotel
